articles.title: Canadian men and women both feel the heat at HSBC Sydney Sevens
articles.description: Looking to rebound after a painful loss to Argentina, Canada's men started well against Australia but conceded 17 second-half points in a 22-7 loss Friday at the HSBC Sydney Sevens.
articles.content:
The Canadian Press
Looking to rebound after a painful loss to Argentina, Canada's men started well against Australia but conceded 17 second-half points in a 22-7 loss Friday at the HSBC Sydney Sevens.

articles.title: Hockey World Cup 2023: India Defeat South Africa 5-2 To Finish At Joint 9th With Argentina
articles.description: For India, Abhishek, Harmanpreet Singh, Shamsher Singh, Akashdeep Singh and Sukhkeet Singh scored one goal each while Mvimbi Samkelo and Cassiem Mustaphaa scored apiece for South Africa.
articles.content:
Abhishek was awarded Player of the Match for scoring a dazzling field goal against South Africa. (Photo: @TheHockeyIndia Twitter)
India defeated South Africa in the classification round match of the FIH Men's Hockey World Cup at Birsa Munda Internati... [416 chars]

articles.title: 'Mutant piglet' born with two snouts baffles farmer: 'So rare'
articles.description: A piglet born last week in Argentina that boasts two snouts, two mouths and two tongues is turning into quite the ham.
articles.content:
A piglet born last week with two snouts, two mouths and two tongues is turning into quite the ham.
Farmer Ramón Aguilar said he has never seen anything like it in all his years of raising pigs.
The “mutant piglet” comes from a farm in the rural area ... [1648 chars]

articles.title: Man City given unexpected Maximo Perrone transfer boost as goalkeeper howler ends Argentina dream
articles.description: Manchester City signed Argentina under-20 international Maximo Perrone from Velez Sarsfield this month.
articles.content:
Manchester City will get a look at their new signing Maximo Perrone sooner than expected, after Argentina's miserable under-20 Championship came to an end on Saturday thanks to an awful goalkeeping error in their final must-win group game.
City signe... [2781 chars]

articles.title: Hockey World Cup: Argentina-born Gonzalo Peillat leads Germany’s stunning turnaround vs Australia
articles.description: Peillat became a German citizen in 2022 which allowed him to restart his international career years after he walked away from Argentina’s national team.
articles.content: At the previous edition of the FIH Hockey Men’s World Cup, Gonzalo Peillat saw his campaign with Argentina end in a 2-3 loss to England in the quarter-finals. Despite scoring twice in that match at the Kalinga Stadium in Bhubaneswar, Peillat saw his ... [4250 chars]
